column4: anyone know a link where to check what the new linux-headers are adding/fixing before I update?
just open update manager and you get a general list of changes

I see I have some linux-headers updates available today but I dont know exactly what the updates are doing, the descriptions in them are jsut generic. Is there a site that shows a release or change log for these?
just open System->Administration->Update Manager and open the 'changes' pane
